title: Google support is not giving back my phone send for repair. Can anyone help as they are not replying
content: I have been chasing to get my google pixel 2 phone back from google support team. It has been 34 days now. They are not replying over emails not over twitter. Just a standard template response after 3-4 days that they dont have the spare available. My phone is in warranty but they are treating it as some kind of favour on customer. I have bern chsing them from 7 months to get the phone repaired but they were delaying it and now when they have picked the phone they are not returning it back. Can anyone help me with the escalation matrix.
